name: Block-a-thon!
description:
Plataformer + Falling Blocks: How long can you survive?

Our first Ludum Dare! We’ve struggled a lot with the theme, and we are still behind the schedule… But it’s alive! I’m working with the code and @ester is working in the game art.

Here’s the prototype!

Controls: Key Arrows and Space bar!

Don’t forget to rate. :3
